steps.title: Input your concept
steps.description: Describe the garment style, theme, or upload inspiration images—our AI interprets text and visuals.

steps.title: AI generates variations
steps.description: Within seconds, see multiple design options rendered in high quality with different cuts, colors, and details.

steps.title: Refine & customize
steps.description: Adjust specific elements—sleeve length, neckline, embellishments—to align with your vision or client needs.

steps.title: Export & produce
steps.description: Download tech packs, share with manufacturers, or publish directly to your storefront for customer orders.
